DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Petal Sponge Sets (8/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Eight Color Petal Sponge Sets are a great idea in face painting sponges. The Snazaroo petal sponge set comes in the eight most popular face painting colors so you can use the red sponge with your red face paint, the white petal sponge with white face paint and so on.
Snazaroo's petal sponges are cut into a petal shape about 3 inches long. The rounded end of the petal sponge is perfect for creating a base of face paint. Flip it around to the pointed end to draw a quick line. The Snazaroo petal sponge is 1 1/2 inches thick so there is less bleed through to keep your hands cleaner.
These petal sponges are very soft to the skin during application but are firm enough to draw a crisp line. 8/pack
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Comes in the eight most popular face painting colors
Petal shape cut about 3" long, 1 1/2" thick
Soft on skin, yet firm enough for drawing
